abstract: Merger talks between British Airways and Spain’s Iberia are going well, the two sides said on Tuesday, hinting that news of a possible deal could arrive next month, according to Reuters.
lead_paragraph: Merger talks between British Airways and Spain’s Iberia are going well, the two sides said on Tuesday, hinting that news of a possible deal could arrive next month, according to Reuters.

headline.main: BA and Iberia Merger Talks Progress
